concept.title: About this publication
concept.shortdesc: IBM StoredIQ Deployment and Configuration Guide provides information about how to plan, deploy, and configure the IBM StoredIQ product.

section.title: IBM StoredIQ product library
section.p: The following documents are available in the IBM® StoredIQ® product library.

ul.li: IBM StoredIQ Deployment and Configuration Guide
IBM StoredIQ Data Server Administration Guide
IBM StoredIQ Data Workbench User Guide
IBM StoredIQ Policy Manager User Guid

section.p: Or, see the Contact IBM web site athttp://www.ibm.com/contact/us/.

section.title: IBM Knowledge Center
section.p: The IBM StoredIQ documentation is available in IBM Knowledge Center.IBM Knowledge Center.

section.title: Contacting IBM
section.p: For general inquiries, call 800-IBM-4YOU (800-426-4968). To contact IBM customer service in the United States or Canada, call 1-800-IBM-SERV (1-800-426-7378).
For more information about how to contact IBM, including TTY service, see the Contact IBM website athttp://www.ibm.com/contact/us/.
